com.jde.model.physics

Class DirectionModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.physics.DirectionModifier

  • public class DirectionModifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This DirectionModifier class contains a range (start and end) for all the parameters in a Direction, in order to iterate and modify it
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

      • modify

        public void modify(int step,
          int total,
          Direction dir)
        This method modifies the given Direction using the parameters of the calling Direction modifier, specifying the point between "start" and "end" giving the step number from a total
        Parameters:
        step - Number of the step, must be: 0 <= step < total
        total - Total number of steps, must be greater than 0
        dir - The direction to modify
